actions.name: Actions
actions.description:
Multi-Attack: 2×Claw and 1×Bite. A Being hit by all three is Restrained and takes 18 (4d8) damage at the start of this Being's Turns.
Bite [Melee Attack]: 7 (d8+3)
Claw [Melee Attack]: 7 (d8+3)
Shapeshift [Cast, Self] (Focus): Takes on the appearance of a Medium Humanlike.

abilities.name: Abilities
abilities.description:
Blair Omniscience: It is always aware of any Beings within the woodland it claims as its domain.
Magic Ward I: Cast Checks that include it as a Target have a d4 penalty.
Terror I: Enemies that can see it for the first time and at the start of their Turns must pass a [Will] Save or be Frightened until they pass this Check on a subsequent Turn, or for Cd4 Rounds afterwards.
